import Ember from 'ember';
 
const {
  isPresent,
  String: { dasherize, htmlSafe }
} = Ember;
 
export default function cssStyleify(hash = {}) {
  let styles = [];
 
  Object.keys(hash).forEach(key => {
    let value = hash[key];
 
    if(isPresent(value)) {
      styles.push(`${dasherize(key)}: ${value}`);
    }
  });
 
  return htmlSafe(styles.join('; '));
}
